description: Defines a Flutter widget named Cell, representing a single cell in a Tic-Tac-Toe game grid, handling user interaction, styling, and display logic.

classes.name: Cell
classes.description: A StatefulWidget representing a cell in the Tic-Tac-Toe grid, displaying 'X', 'O', or empty, with customizable appearance and tap callback.

classes.name: _CellState
classes.description: State class managing the visual state and interaction logic for the Cell widget.

methods.name: createState
methods.description: Creates the mutable state for the Cell widget, returning an instance of _CellState.

methods.name: _handleTapDown
methods.description: Handles tap down gesture, setting _pressed to true for visual feedback.

methods.name: _handleTapCancel
methods.description: Handles gesture cancelation, resetting _pressed to false.

methods.name: _handleTapUp
methods.description: Handles tap release, resetting _pressed to false.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the Cell, applying styling and interaction effects based on the state and properties.
